author: harpersbazaar.com
title: Teyana Taylor Schools' Us In The Art Of Sending Nudes - Teyana Taylor Takes The Perfect Nude
text:
Just when you thought Kim Kardashian was the queen of the nude selfie , Teyana Taylor is here to prove us all wrong. We were all stunned by her hot and sweaty performance in Kanye West's Fade music video last year and now the singer, dancer and model is here to wow us all again. The 26-year-old took a break from her busy schedule attending shows at fashion week for a quick bathroom photoshoot yesterday that redefined the art of going au naturel. Taylor wore a nude-colored bodysuit that shows off every bit of her stunning physique, and captioned the shot "When he asks u for nude ." Genius. She even tagged her husband, NBA player Iman Shumpert, to make sure he got the message.
When he asks u for nude 😋😋😋😋 this @fashionnova jumpsuit got me feeling nice 💦🍊🍊🍊
A post shared by Jimmy Neutch (@teyanataylor) on Feb 21, 2017 at 11:57am PST
If anyone ever trolls you for naked photos, take a note from Taylor and troll them back by dressing up in the shade instead of stripping down.
